external_games.name: Warhammer Underworlds: Online - Warband: Drepur's Wraithcreepers

name: Warhammer Underworlds: Online - Warband: Drepur's Wraithcreepers
summary: Eternal hunters in service of the Great Necromancer Nagash, this band of Glaivewraith Stalkers are driven ever onwards toward their prey by the ceaseless beating of the Patrician's skin drum. Unlock this warband and play as Drepur's Wraithcreepers in Warhammer Underworlds: Online.
